title: I thought Cass was supposed to be a late game champ...
body:
BUT SHE HITS YOU WITH POISON THEN SHE HAS A POINT AND CLICK NO COOLDOWN ABILITY THAT SHE CAN SPAM AND MAKES THE POISON STRONGER AND ALSO YOU ARE EITHER SLOWED OR SHE IS FASTER AND IT TAKES LIKE A 6TH OF YOUR HP EVERYTIME.

THEN LATE GAME SHE HAS LIKE AN EXTRA 30% AP FROM DCAP. 30% FROM PASSIVE. 6-12% FROM DRAGON. AND 5 FROM MASTERY.

OK.

replies.body: she was originally a lane bully until rito shifted some of her power into the late game, still still bullies pretty hard though

I get that dodging the poison is important, and it is quite easy to dodge for a while but in amongst all the csing and the trading and when she does all she has to do is hover her mouse on you and spam E and then your screen just suddenly goes black and white and you respawn at base a few seconds later
who said cass was late game only, cass's abilities are very easy to dodge if you know the range and her e is useless without hitting her q or w, not very hard to play against
